page.title: 01Rural area 02800051
page.content: In our 12 squares there are a lot of {farms}and farm buildings.The main type of agriculture is{dairy farming}with some{cereal}crops.Most of the farms are quite small.The other main industry is{tourism}with bed and breakfast,camping or caravan sites. The landscape consists mainly of {rolling countryside with high hedges {and narrow country lanes}.The main road linking Dartmouth and Totnes runs across the centre of the area. The{oldest settlements}are at{Oldstone {Farm and Capton. {Part}of the area was{evacuated in 1943 to allow{allied troops}to{practise}for the{D-Day Normandy landings}in 1944. From the highest points in the area there are{magnificent views} over Start Bay,Torbay,the River Dart and the distant tors of Dartmoor.
